languages.text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.
languages.original_text: Телепаты — это псайкеры, которые взаимодействуют с разумом цели и способны его подчинять. Силой мысли они могут лишить врага рассудка, заставить его испытать леденящий ужас или же полностью завладеть его разумом, превратив несчастного в покорную марионетку.

traits.locale_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

languages.text: 控心者擅长心智方面的灵能力量，这种灵能者可以触碰他人的思想，对其加以控制。控心者只要一个念头就可以撕碎敌人的理性，诱发无法克制的恐怖，也可以占据目标的思想，让目标完全听从自己的意愿行事。
languages.original_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

traits.locale_text: 控心者擅长心智方面的灵能力量，这种灵能者可以触碰他人的思想，对其加以控制。控心者只要一个念头就可以撕碎敌人的理性，诱发无法克制的恐怖，也可以占据目标的思想，让目标完全听从自己的意愿行事。

languages.text: Los telépatas son psíquicos cuya maestría mental les permite contactar con otras mentes y controlarlas. Con solo pensarlo, un telépata puede despojar a su enemigo de toda cordura, inducirle un terror absoluto o poseer sus pensamientos y manipular sus acciones como su fueran las suyas propias.
languages.original_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

traits.locale_text: Los telépatas son psíquicos cuya maestría mental les permite contactar con otras mentes y controlarlas. Con solo pensarlo, un telépata puede despojar a su enemigo de toda cordura, inducirle un terror absoluto o poseer sus pensamientos y manipular sus acciones como su fueran las suyas propias.

languages.text: テレパスは他者の精神に触れて支配することに特化した心を持つ異能者である。テレパスは、思考ひとつで敵の正気を引き裂き、恐怖の感覚を麻痺させ、思考を掌握して精神感応者に成り代わったかのような行動をとらせることができる。
languages.original_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

traits.locale_text: テレパスは他者の精神に触れて支配することに特化した心を持つ異能者である。テレパスは、思考ひとつで敵の正気を引き裂き、恐怖の感覚を麻痺させ、思考を掌握して精神感応者に成り代わったかのような行動をとらせることができる。

languages.text: Телепаты — это псайкеры, которые взаимодействуют с разумом цели и способны его подчинять. Силой мысли они могут лишить врага рассудка, заставить его испытать леденящий ужас или же полностью завладеть его разумом, превратив несчастного в покорную марионетку.

With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

Телепаты — это псайкеры, которые взаимодействуют с разумом цели и способны его подчинять. Силой мысли они могут лишить врага рассудка, заставить его испытать леденящий ужас или же полностью завладеть его разумом, превратив несчастного в покорную марионетку.

languages.text: Telepathen sind Psioniker, deren mentale Expertise darin liegt, die Gedanken anderer zu finden und zu kontrollieren. Ein Telepath kann seinen Feind mit einem einzelnen Gedanken in den Wahnsinn treiben, Zustände von betäubendem Schrecken hervorrufen oder die Gedanken seines Opfers kontrollieren und es fernsteuern.
languages.original_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

traits.locale_text: Telepathen sind Psioniker, deren mentale Expertise darin liegt, die Gedanken anderer zu finden und zu kontrollieren. Ein Telepath kann seinen Feind mit einem einzelnen Gedanken in den Wahnsinn treiben, Zustände von betäubendem Schrecken hervorrufen oder die Gedanken seines Opfers kontrollieren und es fernsteuern.

languages.text: Les télépathes sont des psykers dont l'expertise mentale consiste à s'insinuer dans l'esprit d'autrui et à en prendre le contrôle. Par la simple pensée, un télépathe peut compromettre la santé mentale de son ennemi, provoquer chez lui des états de terreur abrutissante, ou prendre le contrôle de ses pensées et lui dicter ses actes.
languages.original_text: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.

traits.locale_text: Les télépathes sont des psykers dont l'expertise mentale consiste à s'insinuer dans l'esprit d'autrui et à en prendre le contrôle. Par la simple pensée, un télépathe peut compromettre la santé mentale de son ennemi, provoquer chez lui des états de terreur abrutissante, ou prendre le contrôle de ses pensées et lui dicter ses actes.
